balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

params._id: uint256 id of the token to verify

mint(uint256).details: _id must be registered with registerToken first

params._id: uint256 id of the desired token

returns._0: uint256 instance id of the token minted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: can only be called by the contract owner

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

registerToken(uint256,uint256).details: _id should not already be registered, _supply must be greater than 0

params._id: uint256 id of the token to register, should be incremental

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._metadataBaseURI: string ipfs hash pointing to the NFT metadatas

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: can only be called by the contract owner

uri(uint256).details: URIs are defined in RFC 3986.      URIs are assumed to be deterministically generated based on token ID

exists(uint256).notice: exists verifies a token of type _id is registered

mint(uint256).notice: mint creates a new token of type _id

pause().notice: pause sets the pause state to true

registerToken(uint256,uint256).notice: registerToken creates a new TokenData type for a given _id with a max _supply

unpause().notice: unpause sets the contract state to Unpaused

uri(uint256).notice: A distinct Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a given token.
